00064 struct ENAMstruct
00065 {
00066   // Magical effect, hard-coded ID
00067   short effectID;
00068 
00069   // Which skills/attributes are affected (for restore/drain spells
00070   // etc.)
00071   signed char skill, attribute; // -1 if N/A
00072 
00073   // Other spell parameters
00074   int range; // 0 - self, 1 - touch, 2 - target (RangeType enum)
00075   int area, duration, magnMin, magnMax;
00076 
00077   // Struct size should be 24 bytes
00078 };
00079 #pragma pack(pop)

00081 struct EffectList
00082 {
00083   std::vector<ENAMstruct> list;
00084 
00085   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00086   {
00087     ENAMstruct s;
00088     while(esm.isNextSub("ENAM"))
00089       {
00090         esm.getHT(s, 24);
00091         list.push_back(s);
00092       }
00093   }
00094 };
